column1: Children with significant lordosis will have a large space underneath the lower back when lying face up on a hard surface.
- You may be born with this, it can develop after certain sports activities, such as gymnastics, or it may develop along with arthritis in the spine.
Much less common causes in children include: - Achondroplasia, a disorder of bone growth that causes the most common type of dwarfism - Muscular dystrophies - Other genetic conditions
The health care provider will perform a physical exam.
